column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I get my hair cut at an inexpensive hair salon where people can not make appointments or choose their stylist .
#id=2
#text=So when I get to the shop , the first thing I do is go up to the desk and give my name .
#id=3
#text=Then , I sit and wait with everyone else until my turn comes .
#id=4
#text=Usually I read magazines and eavesdrop on conversations to pass the time .
#id=5
#text=Eventually , a stylist comes and gets me .
#id=6
#text=He or she leads me to a chair in a line of chairs in front of a huge mirror .
#id=7
#text=She -LRB- it is almost always a woman -RRB- puts a plasticized drape around me to keep the hair from going down my blouse .
#id=8
#text=During this period , we also greet one another and tell each other our names .
#id=9
#text=Once she gets me draped she asks me what kind of cut I want , and I usually ask that she just trim what I already have .
#text=I have short fine hair I wear in a wash and wear style , and I never want it washed before it is cut .
#text=She begins cutting my hair , usually asking styling questions like whether I want my ears to show and whether I want the bangs feathered .
#text=As she cuts , we chat about something unimportant , like a dog that runs by the window or a TV show .
#text=Many times I have talked to stylists about their children , or mine .
#text=At the same time , the stylist will exchange a few remarks with other stylists , and I will spy on other peoples ' haircuts .
#text=When she finishes , the stylist will give me a hand mirror so I can inspect the back of my head .
#text=She brushes me off and removes my drape , and I slip her a folded bill .
#text=Chances are I will never see her again .
